security_audit.summary: This skill contains only documentation in markdown format with no executable code. It provides research workflow patterns and templates with no security risks.

content.user_title: Automate Research Workflows with AI Agents
content.value_statement: Stop manually coordinating research tasks across multiple sources. This skill provides structured templates for AI agents to conduct systematic research with proper source management and synthesis.
actual_capabilities: Provides research workflow templates for AI agents
Defines source selection and citation requirements
Includes red flags for quality control
Offers synthesis strategies for combining findings
limitations: Requires manual customization for specific projects
No built-in source databases - must define approved sources
Does not execute research - only provides guidance

use_cases.title: Standardize Research Methods
use_cases.description: Ensure consistent research quality across team members with standardized templates and citation requirements.

use_cases.title: Build Research Agents
use_cases.description: Use as foundation for building AI agents that can conduct systematic research with proper attribution.

use_cases.title: Document Research Processes
use_cases.description: Create clear documentation for research workflows that can be followed by humans or AI systems.

prompt_templates.title: Basic Research Setup
prompt_templates.scenario: Configure research parameters for a new project
prompt_templates.prompt: Using the project-research skill, set up research parameters with MAX_SOURCES=15, SYNTHESIS_STYLE=comprehensive, and REQUIRE_CITATIONS=true for analyzing market trends.

prompt_templates.title: Source Selection Guide
prompt_templates.scenario: Define approved sources for technical research
prompt_templates.prompt: Help me customize the project-research skill to use official documentation, peer-reviewed papers, and verified news sources for researching cloud security trends.

prompt_templates.title: Quality Control Check
prompt_templates.prompt: Review my research process using the red flags section of project-research skill to ensure I'm not making unsupported claims or skipping synthesis steps.

prompt_templates.title: Advanced Pattern Creation
prompt_templates.prompt: Based on the project-research template, help me create a custom pattern for analyzing competitor strategies that includes specific trigger conditions and output formats.

output_examples.input: Set up research workflow for analyzing AI regulation trends
output: Research scope defined: AI regulation trends in 2024
Source selection: Government agencies, legal databases, tech policy institutes
Quality controls: All claims require citations, synthesis mandatory
Output format: Comprehensive report with confidence levels
Citation tracking: All sources documented with URLs and dates

best_practices: Always customize approved sources for your specific domain before use
Train team members on the red flags to ensure quality research
Regularly update source lists to maintain relevance and accuracy
anti_patterns: Using default templates without project-specific customization
Skipping the synthesis step in favor of raw source aggregation

faq.question: Is this skill compatible with Claude Code?
faq.answer: Yes, it works with Claude Code and standard Claude interfaces for research workflow guidance.

faq.question: What are the source limits?
faq.answer: Default is 10 sources but configurable via MAX_SOURCES variable. Adjust based on research depth needed.

faq.question: How do I integrate with existing research tools?
faq.answer: The skill provides framework templates that can reference your existing tools in the approved sources section.

faq.question: Is my research data safe?
faq.answer: Yes, this is documentation-only with no data collection or external calls - all processing happens locally.

faq.question: Why is my research output missing citations?
faq.answer: Ensure REQUIRE_CITATIONS=true and verify synthesis step wasn't skipped - check red flags section for guidance.

faq.question: How does this compare to other research skills?
faq.answer: This focuses on workflow patterns and quality control rather than executing searches - it's a framework for building research processes.
